clusters.title: Example Local News Story Title
clusters.summary: This is an example of how a local news story summary should look. It should be a concise description of the news story that gives readers enough information to decide if they want to read more.

clusters.title: Another Example Story
clusters.summary: This is another example news story. You can have multiple stories in the clusters array. Each story should follow the same format with title, summary, and optional image.
